page.title: 07A Schoolday for Leah
page.content: Every school day I wake up at 6.30 but I laze in bed for about an hour watching breakfast time television. Mum comes in and tells me to get washed and dressed. I go downstairs for breakfast. I usually have cornflakes and cold milk.I brush my teeth, put my coat on and pick up my school bag. Now it is 8.43 and I am ready for school. My Dad takes me to my friend Suzy's house in his van on his way to work in Bedford. He has his own printing firm. Sometimes he has to leave early because he may have an emergency. My Mum has to take me to school then. Suzy and I walk to school just before nine o'clock. We wait in the playground until our teacher lets us in. We have Assembly first.Then if it is Monday we have news time. I like every day but Tuesday because then we have some lessons I'm not keen on.
